verses.verse: In the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H425>Elah<s%> began to <S%H4427>reign<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
He <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> yet not as the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who were before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

Against him came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H8022>Shalmaneser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria;<s%> and <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> became his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H7725>brought<s%> him <S%H4503>tribute.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%> in <S%H1954>Hoshea;<s%> for he had <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H5471>So<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> no <S%H4503>tribute<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> as he had done <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year:<s%> therefore the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> shut him <S%H6113>up,<s%> and <S%H631>bound<s%> him in <S%H1004>prison.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H6696>besieged<s%> it <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

In the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H1540>carried<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1540>away<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and <S%H3427>placed<s%> them in <S%H2477>Halah,<s%> and on the <S%H2249>Habor,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H1470>Gozan,<s%> and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes.<s%>

It was <S%H1121>so,<s%> because the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> who brought them <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> from under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and had <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%>

and <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> cast <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which they <S%H6213>made.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H2644>secretly<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> that were not right against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God:<s%> and they <S%H1129>built<s%> them high <S%H1116>places<s%> in all their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> from the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of the <S%H5341>watchmen<s%> to the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city;<s%>
and they set them <S%H5324>up<s%> <S%H4676>pillars<s%> and <S%H842>Asherim<s%> on every <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill,<s%> and under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree;<s%>

and there they burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in all the high <S%H1116>places,<s%> as did the <S%H1471>nations<s%> whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> carried <S%H1540>away<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6213>them;<s%> and they worked <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> to provoke <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H3707>anger;<s%>
and they <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1544>idols,<s%> of which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6213>them,<s%> "You shall not do this <S%H1697>thing.<s%>"

Yet <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5749>testified<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> every <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and every <S%H2374>seer,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7725>"Turn<s%> from your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> according to all the <S%H8451>law<s%> which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and which I <S%H7971>sent<s%> to you <S%H3027>by<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>"

<S%H8085>Notwithstanding,<s%> they would not listen, but <S%H7185>hardened<s%> their <S%H6203>neck,<s%> like the <S%H6203>neck<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> who <S%H539>didn't<s%> believe in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

They <S%H3988>rejected<s%> his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that he <S%H3772>made<s%> with their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and his <S%H5715>testimonies<s%> which he <S%H5749>testified<s%> to <S%H3212>them;<s%> and they followed <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> and became <S%H1891>vain,<s%> and <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that were <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H3068>them,<s%> concerning whom Yahweh had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them that they should not do like <S%H6213>them.<s%>

They <S%H5800>forsook<s%> all the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> them molten <S%H4541>images,<s%> even <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5695>calves,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H842>Asherah,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> all the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1168>Baal.<s%>

They caused their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H7080>used<s%> <S%H7081>divination<s%> and <S%H5172>enchantments,<s%> and <S%H4376>sold<s%> themselves to <S%H6213>do<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H599>angry<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5493>removed<s%> them out of his <S%H6440>sight:<s%> there was none <S%H7604>left<s%> but the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of Judah <S%H3063>only.<s%>

Also <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8104>didn't<s%> keep the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> but <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> which they <S%H6213>made.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3988>rejected<s%> all the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> <S%H5414>them,<s%> and delivered them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H8154>spoilers,<s%> until he had <S%H7993>cast<s%> them out of his <S%H6440>sight.<s%>

For he <S%H7167>tore<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David;<s%> and they made <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%> <S%H4427>king:<s%> and <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H5080>drove<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and made them <S%H2398>sin<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>walked<s%> in all the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> which he <S%H6213>did;<s%> they <S%H5493>didn't<s%> depart from them;

until <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5493>removed<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of his <S%H6440>sight,<s%> as he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> all his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%> So <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was carried <S%H1540>away<s%> out of their own <S%H127>land<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> men from <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and from <S%H3575>Cuthah,<s%> and from <S%H5755>Avva,<s%> and from <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> and <S%H5617>Sepharvaim,<s%> and <S%H3427>placed<s%> them in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> instead of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the cities of <S%H5892>it.<s%>

So it <S%H8462>was,<s%> at the beginning of their <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H3372>there,<s%> that they didn't fear <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H738>lions<s%> among <S%H2026>them,<s%> which killed some of them.

Therefore they <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H1471>nations<s%> which you have <S%H1540>carried<s%> <S%H3427>away,<s%> and placed in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> <S%H3045>don't<s%> know the <S%H4941>law<s%> of the <S%H430>god<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%> Therefore he has <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H738>lions<s%> among <S%H4191>them,<s%> and behold, they kill <S%H3045>them,<s%> because they don't know the <S%H4941>law<s%> of the <S%H430>god<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212>"Carry<s%> there <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> whom you <S%H1540>brought<s%> from <S%H3212>there;<s%> and let them go and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3384>there,<s%> and let him teach them the <S%H4941>law<s%> of the <S%H430>god<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>"

So <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> whom they had carried <S%H1540>away<s%> from <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H3384>taught<s%> them how they should <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

However every <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> of their <S%H3240>own,<s%> and put them in the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> which the <S%H8118>Samaritans<s%> had <S%H6213>made,<s%> every <S%H1471>nation<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%> in which they <S%H3427>lived.<s%>

The <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> Succoth <S%H5524>Benoth,<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3575>Cuth<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5370>Nergal,<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H807>Ashima,<s%>

and the <S%H5757>Avvites<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5026>Nibhaz<s%> and <S%H8662>Tartak;<s%> and the <S%H5616>Sepharvites<s%> <S%H8313>burnt<s%> their <S%H1121>children<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> to <S%H152>Adrammelech<s%> and <S%H6048>Anammelech,<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H5617>Sepharvaim.<s%>

So they <S%H3373>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> to them from among <S%H7098>themselves<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places,<s%> who <S%H6213>sacrificed<s%> for them in the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places.<s%>

They <S%H3373>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> their own <S%H430>gods,<s%> after the <S%H4941>ways<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> from among whom they had been carried <S%H1540>away.<s%>

To this <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H6213>do<s%> what they <S%H4941>did<s%> <S%H7223>before:<s%> they <S%H3373>don't<s%> fear <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> neither <S%H6213>do<s%> they follow their <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> or their <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> or the <S%H8451>law<s%> or the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> whom he <S%H7760>named<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

with whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, "You shall not <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> nor <S%H7812>bow<s%> yourselves to <S%H5647>them,<s%> nor serve <S%H2076>them,<s%> nor sacrifice to them;

but you shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who brought you <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and you shall <S%H7812>bow<s%> yourselves to <S%H2076>him,<s%> and you shall sacrifice to him.

The <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and the <S%H8451>law<s%> and the <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> which he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> for <S%H8104>you,<s%> you shall observe to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3117>forevermore.<s%> You shall not <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>
You shall not <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that I have <S%H3772>made<s%> with <S%H3372>you;<s%> neither shall you fear <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>
But you shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> and he will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of all your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>"
However they did not <S%H8085>listen,<s%> but they <S%H6213>did<s%> what they <S%H4941>did<s%> <S%H7223>before.<s%>

So these <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H3373>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> their engraved <S%H6456>images.<s%> Their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H1121>likewise,<s%> and their children's <S%H1121>children,<s%> as their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H6213>did,<s%> so they <S%H6213>do<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
